name: BomberPlane
description:
In this game you are a bomber plane who constantly drops bombs to try to hit the silo at the bottom of the screen.   The more you hit the silo the higher your score goes, and if you get hit by a missile three times then the game is over.  

You click (or tap or press shift) to change directions and the timing of your direction change is the only control you have.  Its a one button game that is reminiscent of the simplest 1970s shooters but with modern-ish graphics.
